post.body: I might but would like to know a little about why i would follow Alex.... Can he add profile info? Who is he, what does he do...?
Found them - you changed the format :-)
I did - can find up to #98, nothing after....
Did I miss the last 2 LITS tweets....? Looking for #99 and #100 -- or are you saving them for another day?
This one is even better - they've learned how to do this (travel, doco) w/ the 1st one. And Africa.... so amazing!
Well - no way out: time to get up and make my own eggs and coffee... I did bring back some Jam. Blue Mountain coffee - humm!
@johnwlittle On my way with coffee! Wait... Where am I going? Where's the dock?
@theclimbergirl Can I join you waiting for this magical ferry? Cuz there's no egg fairy cooking b'fast for me here :(
You (and @TeamNSC) helped me reach other goals this year too! And - you provide inspiration -- thank you!
Will definitely look forward to it. Also looking forward to reading about your Colorado 14ers expedition!
Oh man.... I'd so love to go climbing w you and @alan_arnette. Unfrntly cant happen in April... later in '09??? In 2010???
I also took a "silly" picture w/ a funny face. I think that had them confused. I'm always happy when I'm traveling! :->
'Tis very quiet in Twitterverse this early evening... Hockey and football keeping everyone busy?
Spent 2 hrs w/ 10-wk old choco lab puppy Charlotte ("the brunette") - epitome of cute, all sweet, furry, playful, innocent. I love dogs...
On my way to visit @elainenewcombe, and meet her new puppy Charlotte
Really enjoying Long Way Down. Really making me want to plan a serious adventure. Really. Need... more... time....
Watching Ewan McGregor's "Long Way Down" - motorbike trip fr Scotland to Cape Town. Awakening my sense of adventure.... Hum...
Rt the Onion to @robtyrie - Local Woman Dies Of Lost Cell Phone http://twurl.nl/j666si - just funny, even a "Barrette" in the story...
Happy 2009 everyone! Wishing you all the very best for a healthy, prosperous & successful new year!
Funny New Year's wishes: RT @JohnCleese: Happy New Year everyone, and may your new year's flatulence be tuneful and fragrantly inoffensive
